name: wchar.h
description: The `<wchar.h>` header provides functions and types for wide character operations and string handling.

functions.name: btowc
functions.description: Converts a single-byte character to a wide character.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The single-byte character to convert.

functions.name: wctob
functions.description: Converts a wide character to a single-byte character.

parameters.name: wc
parameters.description: The wide character to convert.

functions.name: mbrlen
functions.description: Determines the length of the next multibyte character in a wide character string.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The wide character string.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The maximum number of bytes to examine.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: The conversion state.

functions.name: mbrtowc
functions.description: Converts a multibyte character to a wide character.

parameters.name: pwc
parameters.description: A pointer to the wide character where the result is stored.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: A pointer to the multibyte character.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The maximum number of bytes to examine.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: The conversion state.

functions.name: mbsinit
functions.description: Checks if a multibyte conversion state is initial.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: The conversion state to check.

parameters.name: s1
parameters.description: The first wide character string.

parameters.name: s2
parameters.description: The second wide character string.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The maximum number of wide characters to compare.

functions.name: wmemcpy
functions.description: Copies wide characters from one buffer to another.

parameters.name: dest
parameters.description: A pointer to the destination buffer.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: A pointer to the source buffer.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of wide characters to copy.

functions.name: wmemmove
functions.description: Moves wide characters from one buffer to another, handling overlaps correctly.

parameters.name: dest
parameters.description: A pointer to the destination buffer.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: A pointer to the source buffer.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of wide characters to move.

functions.name: wmemset
functions.description: Fills a buffer with a wide character value.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: A pointer to the buffer to fill.

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: The wide character value to fill the buffer with.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of wide characters to fill.

functions.name: wcslen
functions.description: Determines the length of a wide character string.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The wide character string.
